name: Exchange of park property
text:
The counties may accept from or transfer to the State, park lands, which may include related improvements, personnel, equipment, and functions. [L 1987, c 335, §3]
Note

  Transfer of parks between State and counties.  L 1988, c 7 repealing L 1984, c 34; L 1991, c 312.
Cross References

  Aina Hoomalu, see §§184-31, 32.
  State provisions, see §184-3.
